channel.title: CVE Feed for National Instruments -- LabVIEW 2016 Evaluation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for National Instruments -- LabVIEW 2016 Evaluation

item.title: CVE-2017-2775|2024-08-05T14:02:07.786Z -- national%20instruments -- labview%202016%20evaluation
item.description: An exploitable memory corruption vulnerability exists in the LvVariantUnflatten functionality in 64-bit versions of LabVIEW before 2015 SP1 f7 Patch and 2016 before f2 Patch. A specially crafted VI file can cause a user controlled value to be used as a loop terminator resulting in internal heap corruption. An attacker controlled VI file can be used to trigger this vulnerability, exploitation could lead to remote code execution.
